Name: 10 Second Ninja
About the game: Ninjas are cool, this is an established fact of the universe. Nazi Robots from space are not cool, they are the complete opposite of cool, and Robot Hitler is out to get you, the world's first ninja. You have 10 seconds to destroy all Nazi Robots in your vicinity. IT. IS. ON. Become the ultimate Ninja and take down Robot Hitlerâ€™s automated autocracy in this blisteringly fast platformer. Ready, Steady, Ninja! Features Blitz through 40 challenging levels! Fight again and again to get the best time possible and a glorious three star rating! Break your controller or keyboard out of anger! Battle your friends down to the millisecond on the leaderboards Prove you know how to play games and collect all 30 achievements Warning: This game contains flashing images. It is advised that you do not play if you suffer from photosensitive epilepsy.
